title: Panic when compiling piston_window

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
~/git/conrod (master=) RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo run --example all_widgets
   Compiling piston_window v0.2.1
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Error { repr: Os(2) }', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libcore/result.rs:729

stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7fd752012733 - sys::backtrace::write::h8f69c25b82e602958cs

  11:     0x7fd7501a5da8 - metadata::creader::CrateReader<'a>::resolve_crate_deps::closure.96704
  12:     0x7fd7501a5c2b - collections::hash::map::HashMap<K, V, S>.FromIterator<(K, V)>::from_iter::h5220115240541431839
  13:     0x7fd7501a3fb0 - metadata::creader::CrateReader<'a>::register_crate::hbf0843950fb74105e8l
  14:     0x7fd7501a270a - metadata::creader::CrateReader<'a>::resolve_crate::h02ee83f71b35611eGam

Could not compile `piston_window`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
~/git/conrod (master=)
```

I've tried with release, beta and nightly.
